title: Nigerian Catholics see no same same-sex blessings soon
text:
Reuters Videos Nigerian Catholics see no same same-sex blessings soon Reuters Videos Updated December 29, 2023 at 4:58 PM Link Copied Read full article
STORY: Nigerian Catholics Jane and her partner Lucy have little hope their local parish church will bless their same-sex union anytime soon.
And that's despite a landmark Vatican ruling allowing such blessings.
In Nigeria, as in many African nations, same-sex relationships are criminalized.
Jane believes it could be 20 or 30 years before bishops in her country can accept the pope's decision.
"It is also new to them like it's new to every other person, and they have to process it. Until they finish the processing, I think like here in Nigeria we will have to wait. We will have to be very patient."
Conservative Catholics have condemned the Vatican's declaration two weeks ago, which allows blessings for same-sex couples as long as they are not part of the regular Church rituals or liturgies.
Bishops from several African countries, including Nigeria, said they will not bless same-sex couples.
They argue the change can be interpreted as optional.
Pope Francis, who approved the declaration, has hit back against criticism and what he called inflexible ideological positions that hinder the Church from moving forward.
Father Patrick Alumunku is director of communications for the Catholic Archdiocese of Nigeria's capital Abuja.
He says the Vatican declaration was unsettling for many followers, but should be viewed as a move towards inclusiveness.
"They are also children of God. The judgement, finally of what a person is, depends on God in the very end. I think that’s what the Pope said, who am I to judge?"
Alumunku also denied that this was an incremental step towards eventually accepting same-sex unions in church.
"The pope's declaration is still in good faith for us."
For Jane, the fact that the issue is being openly discussed is reason enough to consider eventually approaching her priest for a blessing, if her partner agrees.
"We are getting there," she said. "A moment of self expression and acceptance is coming."

author: Jack Bamford
title: Jack Home Joins Worcestershire with a Three-Year Contract
text:
Table of Contents
Toggle
Worcestershire Secures Young Talent Career Milestone for Jack Home Impressive Performance in One-Day Cup Home Expresses His Gratitude Worcestershire Secures Young Talent
Worcestershire County Cricket Club has officially signed pace bowler Jack Home to a three-year contract.
Career Milestone for Jack Home The 18-year-old cricketer has been associated with Worcestershire’s development programs for over ten years. His elevation to the senior team came in July, following a series of injuries that plagued the squad.
Impressive Performance in One-Day Cup Jack Home showcased his talent by participating in five matches during Worcestershire’s 2024 One-Day Cup season, where he made a significant impact by taking 16 wickets.
Home Expresses His Gratitude “To be given the opportunity to play for this club and to sign a three-year contract is a dream come true, and it didn’t take much time to say yes,” Home stated. He also added, “I know I’m not the finished article but I’m very happy with how I performed, with the rewards I’ve been given and how it has all panned out. It couldn’t have gone any better.”

title: Voici le thème du message pour la paix du 1er janvier choisi par le Pape
text: L’article que vous allez lire est entièrement gratuit. Pour qu’il le demeure et soit accessible au plus grand nombre, soutenez Aleteia ! [Je fais un don*](https://fr.aleteia.org/soutenez-aleteia/?utm_campaign=christmas2023&utm_content=cta&utm_medium=inread_box&utm_source=fr_aleteia) *avec réduction fiscale Le pape François a choisi de consacrer son traditionnel message pour la paix du 1er janvier à l’ »intelligence artificielle », indique un communiqué du dicastère pour le Service du développement humain intégral transmis le 8 août 2023. Le Pape insistera notamment pour que la sphère de l’éducation et du droit s’empare de la question du développement de ces nouvelles technologies alors que ces derniers mois ont vu l’arrivée de nouvelles innovations spectaculaires telle que l’interface ChatGPT. Chaque 1er janvier depuis 1968, l’Église catholique célèbre la Journée mondiale de la paix et, à cette occasion, François propose un message dans lequel il confie ses préoccupations et souhaits pour les temps à venir. En [janvier dernier](/2023/01/01/en-direct-de-rome-un-1er-janvier-entre-benediction-de-francois-et-memoire-de-benoit/), il était par exemple revenu sur la pandémie de Covid-19 et s’était désolé du retour de la guerre sur le continent européen qu’il qualifiait de « calamité ». L’urgence d’une « réflexion éthique » Pour 2024, le Pape proposera une réflexion sur le développement de l’intelligence artificielle (IA) qui a « un impact de plus en plus profond sur l’activité humaine, la vie personnelle et sociale, la politique et l’économie ». Il soulignera « la nécessité d’être vigilant et d’œuvrer pour qu’une logique de violence et de discrimination ne s’enracine pas dans la production et l’utilisation de ces dispositifs, au détriment des plus fragiles et des exclus », détaille le communiqué. Pour le Pape, il y a « urgence » à orienter la conception et l’utilisation des intelligences artificielles de « manière responsable » afin qu’elles soient au « service de l’humanité et de la protection de notre maison commune ». Il faut dès lors que « la réflexion éthique s’étende à la sphère de l’éducation et du droit » pour s’assurer de la « sauvegarde de la dignité de la personne » et « du souci d’une fraternité réellement ouverte à toute la famille humaine ». La réflexion autour des nouvelles technologies n’est pas nouvelle au [Vatican](/tag/vatican/). Régulièrement, le pape François interpelle les décideurs et les utilisateurs quant à leurs finalités. En 2020, sous l’égide du Saint-Siège, plusieurs institutions avaient signé L’Appel de Rome pour une éthique de l’IA, un document développé par l’Académie pontificale pour la vie prônant le développement de technologies plus transparentes, inclusives, socialement bénéfiques et responsables. Parmi les premiers signataires se trouvaient les entreprises Microsoft et IBM ou encore l’Organisation des Nations Unies pour l’alimentation et l’agriculture (FAO).

title: Adolescente de 16 anos é segunda vítima brasileira de bombardeios no Líbano, diz família | Jovem Pan
text: Itamaraty não confirma a morte da catarinense Mirna Raef Nasser, que vivia no país árabe desde o primeiro ano de vida; bombardeio aconteceu na mesma região onde Ali Kamal Abdallah foi atingido Mirna Raef Nasser, uma adolescente brasileira de 16 anos, foi morta durante um bombardeio no Líbano , em meio ao conflito entre Israel e o grupo Hezbollah , de acordo com a família da jovem. Ela seria a segunda vítima brasileira desde a intensificação dos combates. Mirna nasceu em Balneário Camboriú, no litoral de Santa Catarna, e vivia no Líbano com a família desde o primeiro ano de vida. De acordo com o tio da adolescente, Ali Bu Khaled, a família havia deixado a região atingida pelos ataques, mas retornou à casa para buscar pertences, momento em que foram surpreendidos pelo bombardeio. O pai de Mirna também morreu no ataque. O Ministério das Relações Exteriores (Itamaraty) ainda não confirmou oficialmente a morte da jovem, mas está prestando apoio às famílias afetadas no Líbano. O Itamaraty também lamentou a morte de Ali Kamal Abdallah , outro brasileiro de 15 anos, que foi atingido por um ataque israelense no início da semana no vale do Beeka, mesma região onde Mirna foi atingida. Desde o início dos bombardeios, mais de 600 pessoas já perderam a vida no Líbano, segundo a ONU, e milhares foram forçadas a deixar suas casas. O governo brasileiro condenou os ataques aéreos e pediu o fim imediato das hostilidades na região. Publicada por Felipe Dantas *Reportagem produzida com auxílio de IA
